ModelBase¶

class shabda.models.ModelBase(hparams=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class inherited by all model classes.

A model class implements interfaces that are compatible with TF Estimator. In particular, _build() implements the model_fn interface; and get_input_fn() is for the input_fn interface.

_build(features, labels, params, mode, config=None)[source]¶

Used for the model_fn argument when constructing tf.estimator.Estimator.

static default_hparams()[source]¶

Returns a dictionary of hyperparameters with default values.

hparams¶

A HParams instance. The hyperparameters of the model.

ModelsFactory¶

class shabda.models.ModelsFactory[source]¶

Bases: object

Factory class to import the models dynamically. This is used in conjuction with experiments, where dataset can be plugged in with the change of the filename

static get(model_name)[source]¶

Returns the class handle for the given file name :param dataset_file_name: :return: class handle

Bases: shabda.models.internal.model_base.ModelBase

Base class for classification models

static default_hparams()[source]¶

Returns a dictionary of hyperparameters with default values.
